title: Lava Beds National Monument: Borrow Clipboards
body: × Rate the Lesson Plan             Media For Loan Clipboards   Lava Beds National Monument       We have 25 clipboards for loan, that you can use with your class while learning in the park. Borrowing Instructions Please call the education coordinator at 530-667-8119, a week in advance so we have have the clipboards ready when you stop by the visitor's center to pick them up.
